name: Spycrow
description:
You are a crow, almost starving and then finds a farm with a lot of pumpkins. The perfect place to eat!

The problem? The farm has a lot of scarecrows! You must move slowly and stealth to avoid the sight of the scarecrows and eat the delicious pumpkins you have found.

Use AWSD to move. You MUST avoid the sight of the scarecrows. Once you reach the field with the pumpkin (small orange square), the crow will automatically eat the pumpkin.

Tip: use the grass field! When you are on a grass field, you become invisible to the scarecrows.

DISCLAIMER: the songs and the low-poly grass weren't created by me! I do not own these assets and therefore this game will not be sold. This game was developed solely with the learning purpose.
